title: Navigate forwards to an unchecked checkbox in reading mode
refs: sets focus on a link before the first checkbox
assertion1: Navigate forwards to the first checkbox.
assertion4: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Navigate backwards to an unchecked checkbox in reading mode
refs: sets focus on a link after the first checkbox
assertion1: Navigate backwards to the first checkbox.
assertion4: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Navigate forwards to an unchecked checkbox in interaction mode
refs: sets focus on a link before the first checkbox
assertion1: Navigate forwards to the first checkbox.
assertion4: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Navigate backwards to an unchecked checkbox in interaction mode
refs: sets focus on a link after the first checkbox
assertion1: Navigate forwards to the first checkbox.
assertion4: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Navigate forwards to an unchecked checkbox
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the first checkbox
refs: checkbox aria-checked
instructions: Navigate forwards to the first checkbox.
assertion1: Role 'checkbox' is conveyed
assertion3: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Navigate backwards to an unchecked checkbox
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link after the first checkbox
refs: checkbox aria-checked
instructions: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the unchecked state.

title: Navigate forwards to a checked checkbox in reading mode
refs: sets focus on a link before the first checkbox and sets the state of the first checkbox to checked
assertion1: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion4: State of the checkbox (checked) is conveyed

title: Navigate backwards to a checked checkbox in reading mode
refs: sets focus on a link after the first checkbox and sets the state of the first checkbox to checked
assertion1: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion4: State of the checkbox (checked) is conveyed

assertion1: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the checked state.

assertion1: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the checked state.

refs: checkbox aria-checked

assertion3: State of the checkbox (checked) is conveyed

instructions: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion1: Role 'checkbox' is conveyed

title: Operate a checkbox in reading mode
assertion1: Check and uncheck the first checkbox.

title: Operate a checkbox in interaction mode
assertion1: Check and uncheck the first checkbox.

title: Operate a checkbox
refs: aria-checked
instructions: Check and uncheck the first checkbox.
assertion1: Change in state is conveyed

title: Read an unchecked checkbox in reading mode
refs: sets focus on the first checkbox
assertion1: When the reading cursor is on the first checkbox
assertion4: Name 'Lettuce' is conveyed
assertion5: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Read an unchecked checkbox in interaction mode
refs: sets focus on the first checkbox
assertion1: When the focus is on the first checkbox
assertion4: Name 'Lettuce' is conveyed
assertion5: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Read an unchecked checkbox
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the first checkbox
refs: checkbox aria-checked
instructions: When the focus is on the first checkbox
assertion1: read the first checkbox
assertion4: State of the checkbox (not checked) is conveyed

title: Read a checked checkbox in reading mode
refs: sets focus on the first checkbox and sets its state to checked
assertion1: When the reading cursor is on the first checkbox
assertion2: read the first checkbox.  Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion4: Name 'Lettuce' is conveyed
assertion5: State of the checkbox ( checked) is conveyed

title: Read a checked checkbox in interaction mode
refs: sets focus on the first checkbox and sets its state to checked
assertion1: When the focus is on the first checkbox
assertion2: read the first checkbox.  Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion4: Name 'Lettuce' is conveyed
assertion5: State of the checkbox (checked) is conveyed

title: Read a checked checkbox
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on the first checkbox and sets its state to checked
refs: checkbox aria-checked
instructions: When the focus is on the first checkbox
assertion1: read the first checkbox.  Note: it should be in the checked state.
assertion4: State of the checkbox (checked) is conveyed

title: Read grouping information of a grouped checkbox in reading mode
assertion1: When reading cursor is on a checkbox
assertion4: Group name 'Sandwich Condiments' is conveyed

title: Read grouping information of a grouped checkbox in interaction mode
assertion1: When focus is on a checkbox
assertion4: Group name 'Sandwich Condiments' is conveyed

title: Read grouping information of a grouped checkbox
refs: group aria-labelledby
instructions: When focus is on a checkbox
assertion1: read its grouping information

title: Navigate sequentially through a checkbox group in reading mode
assertion1: Navigate both forward and backward into and out of  the checkbox group.
assertion4: Group boundaries at start and end of group are conveyed

title: Navigate sequentially through a checkbox group
refs: checkbox group aria-checked
instructions: Navigate both forward and backward into and out of  the checkbox group.
assertion1: Role 'group' is conveyed
assertion3: Group boundaries at start and end of group are conveyed

title: Navigate into a checkbox group in reading mode
assertion1: Navigate from outside the checkbox group to a checkbox inside the group. Test both navigating forward into the start and backward into the end.
assertion4: 2:The group boundary is conveyed

title: Navigate into a checkbox group in interaction mode
assertion1: Navigate from outside the checkbox group to a checkbox inside the group. Test both navigating forward into the start and backward into the end.
assertion4: 2:The group boundary is conveyed

title: Navigate into a checkbox group
refs: checkbox group aria-checked
instructions: Navigate from outside the checkbox group to a checkbox inside the group. Test both navigating forward into the start and backward into the end.
assertion1: 2:Role 'group' is conveyed

title: Navigate out of a checkbox group  in reading mode
assertion1: Navigate from a checkbox inside the checkbox group to an element outside the checkbox group. Test both navigating forward out of the end and backward out of the start.
assertion4: 2:The group boundary is conveyed

title: Navigate out of a checkbox group in interaction mode
assertion1: Navigate from a checkbox inside the checkbox group to an element outside the checkbox group. Test both navigating forward out of the end and backward out of the start.
assertion4: 2:The group boundary is conveyed

title: Navigate out of a checkbox group
refs: checkbox group aria-checked
instructions: Navigate from a checkbox inside the checkbox group to an element outside the checkbox group. Test both navigating forward out of the end and backward out of the start.
assertion1: 2:Role 'group' is conveyed
